A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A ton of plot holes hastily filled in\, and many left open. Terrible script and lots of random hopping between characters. Finn's journey could have removed completely and nothing would have changed. The love story between him and the mechanic felt contrite\, forced\, and too soon (3 days!?). Admiral What's-Her-Name could have saved so many lives by simply being a good leader and communicating with her crew. The cave scene and stupid and completely useless to the story. NONE of the characters grew or changed throughout the story\, except Kyle Ren\, he was the only saving grace. His believable twisting and breaking was amazing\, I was beyond impressed by Adam Driver. Mark Hamill and Carrie Fisher's acting were both fantastic despite poor writing and ineffective plot building.
